headline: 3 Reasons This Artificial Intelligence Stock Could Have the Biggest Comeback in 2025
summary: The Trade Desk is capitalizing on strong demand for its AI-powered advertising technology solutions.  Following a dismal start to the year for The Trade Desk (NASDAQ: TTD), shareholders are hoping the second half of 2025 reprograms the narrative.  The stock is down 47% from its 52-week-high amid the broader market turbulence, even as the advertising technology (adtech) pioneer continues to generate impressive growth.
